entry.title: Show Me Everything and Tell Me How
entry.summary:
Author: even_atlas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,588Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: “Clark,” Bruce says. Clark looks up to see Bruce watching him over his shoulder. “I just want you to explain it to me,” he adds softly. “That’s all.”Clark raises an eyebrow.“While inside me,” Bruce amends. “I want you to explain it to me while you’re inside me.”Shaking his head in disbelief, Clark starts pumping his fingers again. Bruce’s dick twitches between his legs, steadily growing redder at the tip. “Knowing things turns you on.”“Got it in one,” Bruce sighs, the sound turning into a high whine when Clark rubs his fingertips over his prostate once more. “Please,” he begs, voice barely above a whisper.

entry.title: Operation: Díaz Family
entry.summary:
Author: WatercolorAru

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,573Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 272

Summary: Superman and Batman have been dating for years. Clark has revealed his identity, but Batman still has his reserves. This can't continue like that, so Batman attempts to reveal his identity one day, after an event in Wayne Enterprises.Keyword: "attempts".It all goes off the rails and the next minute, he's stuffing his family into a suburban house and pretending to be Bruno Díaz, Wayne Enterprises employee.Based on a Tumblr post by secretidentie.

Wayne has not been available for comment..."“What about Batman?” Tim asked.“No sightings since the funeral.”“Ladies and Gentleman,” Luthor announced, “I give you Superboy! Summary: “B?”Not dead, goddammit. Bruce opened his eyes slowly, bright lights flooding his senses.“B! You’re awake!”Bruce’s eyes focused on the first thing they saw, which was another pair of eyes, mere inches from his face. Dark eyelashes framed the eyes, smile lines dotted the corners. The irises were a deep shade of bright blue, something Bruce would never see on Earth.“Kal?” Bruce whispered, his voice hoarse.

entry.title: Then He Kiss'd Me
entry.summary:
Author: Alwhisker

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,634Chapters: 8/20Kudos: 141

Summary: .... - "I didn’t need a glorified spandex ad to come to my aid" Wayne's tone was glowering and slightly breathless as he wiped the blood off his chin, looking over to the caped man who’d been covered in dust and rain, clark was taken aback, but remained his composure, it wasn't time to bicker with billionaires just yet. "you're welcome" he muttered, floating up to look over the crowd, he watched as the officers surrounded Bruce Wayne, EMT's checking over his wounds as the criminals were carted away into padded cars, flashing lights of cameras clicking around the scene. but clark could only focus on the man wiping his bleeding lip, effortlessly drawing him in, among the thousands of voices in his mind, only one stood out.only one."Alfred, I promise you I am fine, I- no, my leg’s fine, Grayson. Damian, stop."Clark found himself grinning, soft enough that he didn't notice it at first, but the clicks of cameras and flashing lights woke him up from his daydream, the wind under his chin was getting colder, Gotham's air was gentle on his skin, despite the smog in the air and the scent of blood that somehow always lingered, no matter how much they scrubbed down the streets.
